publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4107 Cathy Jamieson: Industrial Dispute at Ayr College—That the Parliament is concerned at the failure to achieve a negotiated settlement of the industrial action at Ayr College; notes that the college board has imposed a pay settlement without the agreement of the EIS; is further concerned about the impact of ongoing industrial action at Ayr College on students whose exams are imminent, and calls on the Scottish Government to take action to bring all parties to the table to ensure that the situation is resolved as quickly as possible.

S3M-4107 Industrial Dispute at Ayr College (lodged on 11 May 2009) Bill Butler*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, David Whitton*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Whitefield*, John Scott*, John Park*, James Kelly*
S3M-4107 Industrial Dispute at Ayr College (lodged on 11 May 2009) Hugh Henry*
